name: Tether Blast (DuncanPriebe)
description:
Created as a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, Tether Blast is an action-packed mobile experience that's sure to test your finger speed, precision and reaction time.

Tether Blast is designed for mobile, as it requires multiple touch inputs. Create a tether by touching the screen at two points, and use the tether to destroy the red energy. And leave the green ones alone!
